bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, double-butted front triangle with ORE DT, 100mm travel, reinforced disc mount, externally machined HT, forged drop outs with eyelets and 06 replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Alloy A-head forged and tig weldeded w/ four bolt clamp
RockShox Tora 318 SL, coil spring,100mm, 32mm Cr-Mo stanchions, alloy steerer, motion control damping, preloadand rebound adjustment w/ Lock Out
Alloy, 25mm XC rise, double-butted, 6 degree upsweep, 8 degree sweep, 640mm width
Shimano Deore, 34.9mm clamp, top swing, bottom pull
Avid BB-5, mechanical disc with 6" Roundagon rotor
Avid BB-5, mechanical disc with 6" Roundagon rotor
Specialized disc, 32h double sealed w/alloy QR
Truvativ, Power Spline, sealed cartridge bearing with alloy cups
SUN DS2 disc, double wall, 32h w/eyelets
Specialized BGSport MTB, light weight foam
Chain stay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
